description: Monitors Kafka metrics from Prometheus. Shows active controllers, partitions, ISR shrink rate, purgatory size etc. Uses JMX exporter.

panels.description: Amount of time it takes for the server to respond to a client request (since the server was started).
panels.title: Request avg. latency

panels.description: Number of queued requests in the server. This goes up when the server receives more requests than it can process.
panels.title: Outstanding requests

panels.description: Number of client packets received (responses and notifications).
panels.title: Received rate

panels.description: Number of client packets sent (responses and notifications).
panels.title: Sent rate

panels.description: Number of znodes in the Zookeeper namespace.
panels.title: Node count

panels.description: Number of watchers setup over Zookeeper nodes.
panels.title: Watch count

title: Kafka service metrics
